query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK, T.PSPID, T.POSID, T.ZSITE_NM, T.ZSPEC1, T.ZSPEC2, T.STATE, T.NAMET, T.INSLFN, T.GBN , T.INSLFN_NM, T.WRKLFN, T.WRKLFN_NM, T.MWBTR, T.CNFDT, T.ZFDAT, T.BLDAT, '' AS LIFNR, T.TEXT30 , T.AFQ , T.EHTH , T.DCARIL, T.DCWRIL, CASE WHEN F.LIFNR10 <> '' THEN F.CDATE ELSE '00000000' END AS IDATE, T.ZZCHAKD, T.WRK_APL_DAT, T.DAESU, T.SEOLCHI_LIFNR, T.INS_DAT, T.INSLFN_DT, T.NAMET2, T.REQ_CELL, T.CHG_INDC, T.FR_INSLFN, T.JUNGO_APPLY, T.F_DATE, T.T_DATE, T.ZQNTY, T.APPLY_INDC FROM (SELECT A.MANDT, A.PSPID, A.POSID, B.ZSITE_NM, C.ZSPEC1, C.ZSPEC2, A.STATE, C.NAMET, A.INSLFN, A.INSLFN AS FR_INSLFN, A.GBN , (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.INSLFN) AS INSLFN_NM, A.WRKLFN, (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.WRKLFN) AS WRKLFN_NM, (A.MWBTR * 100) AS MWBTR, D.MDATE AS CNFDT, CASE WHEN CAST(A.BLDAT AS INT) <= 20160331 AND CAST(A.BLDAT AS INT) <> 0 THEN D.MDATE ELSE A.ZFDAT END ZFDAT, A.BLDAT,
C.TEXT30,
VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AFQ' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , 0) AS AFQ, --층수 VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_EHTH' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , 0 ) AS EHTH, -- 전숭 VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_DCARIL' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , '' ) AS DCARIL, VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_DCWRIL' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , '' ) AS DCWRIL, C.ZZCHAKD, A.WRK_APL_DAT, VALUE(TRIM(T08.KWMENGT),'0') AS DAESU , L.NAME1 AS SEOLCHI_LIFNR , A.INS_DAT , '' AS INSLFN_DT , C.NAMET2 , (SELECT X.CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 X WHERE X.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X.POSIT = 'X' AND X.GBN = 'A' AND X.RETIF = '' AND X.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND X.TEMNO = C.TEMNO2 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS REQ_CELL , '' AS CHG_INDC , (SELECT CASE WHEN TRIM(B.STATE) = '3' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0023 B WHERE B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.PSPID = A.PSPID AND B.POSID = A.POSID AND B.ZTYPE = '2' ) JUNGO_APPLY , DECODE(H.F_DATE,'00000000','',H.F_DATE) AS F_DATE , DECODE(H.T_DATE,'00000000','',H.T_DATE) AS T_DATE , B.ZQNTY , CASE WHEN C.ZZSHIP1 >= '20191007' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS APPLY_INDC FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.POSID AND A.POSID = C.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS L ON L.MANDT = C.MANDT AND L.LIFNR = C.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0008 T08 ON A.MANDT = T08.MANDT AND A.PSPID = T08.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0207 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID AND A.POSID = D.POSID AND D.GUBUN = 'A' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTSITURM81 H ON A.MANDT = H.MANDT AND A.PSPID = H.PSPID AND A.POSID = H.POSID AND H.CHK_KIND = 'A' AND H.CHASU = '001' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.STATE = #STATE2# AND A.GBN = 'H' AND C.ZSPEC4 NOT IN ('FT')
AND (C.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND (A.BLDAT BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
-- AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#) AND (C.LIFNR = #LIFNR# OR A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청) -- AND (C.LIFNR = #LIFNR# OR A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND C.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
) AS T
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0010 AS F ON T.MANDT = F.MANDT AND T.PSPID = F.POSID AND T.POSID = F.POSID_1
WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND ( T.AFQ >= 10 OR (T.AFQ <10 AND T.EHTH >= 35000 ) ) AND NOT (T.DCARIL = 'Y' AND T.DCWRIL = 'Y') ORDER BY T.PSPID, T.POSID WITH UR
